title: Removing all runes and making them free was supposed to allow easier access to buying champions...
body: But with the extremely limited income of BE, it looks to me it just got much harder to purchase champions. I feel as though maybe we were lied to about that reasoning....

replies.body:
it will be EASIER for you to get champions.
It will be HARDER for you to get the champions YOU WANT.

No.

It is as fast, if not faster, for you to get any champion at all in the new system. If you disenchant the shards you receive, you can use the blue essence to get champions at least as quickly as you could with ip.

If you happen to get the shard for a champion you want, it will be MUCH faster than that.

Even if what you are saying is true and there are situations when you can get even more BE than earlier, it certanly doesn't feel like that. It feels like we are pushing for some big milestone while in reality we will just end up with 1.5 450 BE champions after a level up. Getting to one milestone is way worse than getting rewarded for everything that you do no matter if you win, lose or level up

Yeah, I think that the new system feeling different or worse is good feedback which we are watching carefully.

But I'm also seeing this perception that the new system is giving you less currency - and that's not true. It's difficult to have a conversation about how the system feels when not everyone has the right facts.
The new system *feels* like it is giving less currency, even if it is giving more. The fact that is does give more doesn’t make it not feel like more of a tedious painful grind than ever before.

> It might be faster for new players. But when you level up and only get 2 champion shards from your level up capsule, you're not gaining much at all.

The only time you should see an average decrease is if you're playing more than eight games a day. One FWotD for every 8 games played is about the break even point -- at that point you earn, on average, 1 less BE/IP per game than you would have in the old system.

Remember that the level capsules aren't all equal, so right now, when people haven't leveled much, a little bad luck can make this system seem miserable. Gotta give it time to equalize, because the average IS an overall increase.
